original_text:
I have heard a message from the Lord,
    and an envoy has been sent among the nations:
“Gather yourselves together and come against her,
    and rise up for battle!
korean_text: 내가 여호와에게서부터 오는 소식을 들었노라 사절을 여러 나라 가운데 보내어 이르시되 너희는 모여와서 그를 치며 일어나서 싸우라

sentences.original_text: I have heard a message from the Lord
and an envoy has been sent among the nations
Gather yourselves together and come against her
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 함께 모여 그녀를 치러 오고
